mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reader_info( reader_id, name, password, sex, birthday, address, telephone, card_state ) VALUES(#{reader_id},#{name},#{password},#{sex},#{birthday},#{address},#{telephone},#{card_state})
mapper.select: select count(*) from reader_info WHERE reader_id=#{reader_id}
select * FROM reader_info where reader_id=#{reader_id} and password=#{password}

select count(*) from reader_info
and reader_id LIKE concat("%",#{reader_id},"%") and name LIKE concat("%",#{rname},"%")
mapper.update: UPDATE reader_info SET reader_id=#{reader_id}, name=#{name}, sex=#{sex}, birthday=#{birthday}, address=#{address}, telephone=#{telephone}, card_state=#{card_state} where id=#{id}
update reader_info set password=#{password} where reader_id=#{reader_id}
